tool_description: Analyzes transaction data by geographic regions to identify sales patterns, regional performance, and market opportunities.

transaction_data_id.description: Reference ID of previously extracted transaction data

geographic_grouping.description: Level of geographic grouping: country, state, city, postal_code

top_regions_count.description: Number of top-performing regions to highlight

error_messages: Invalid transaction data ID: Provided ID does not reference valid transaction data.
Invalid geographic grouping: Use one of [country, state, city, postal_code].
Invalid top regions count: Must be an integer between 1 and 100.
Missing geographic data: Transaction data must contain location information for geographic analysis.
Insufficient geographic coverage: Need transactions from at least 3 different locations for meaningful analysis.
usage: Provide transaction_data_id with geographic information, specify grouping level and number of top regions to analyze for geographic sales insights.

top_regions.description: Top performing regions by revenue with performance metrics

regional_revenue.description: Revenue amounts for each analyzed region

geographic_coverage.description: Number of unique geographic regions with transactions

revenue_concentration.description: Percentage of total revenue from top 3 regions

geographic_trends.description: Analysis of geographic sales trends and patterns
